title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1024.4 - Incorporation by reference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1024.4 - Incorporation by reference

State Regulations

The provisions of the regulations of the U.S. D.O.T. and
the Nuclear Regulatory Commission which have been incorporated by reference in
this section have been filed in the Office of the Secretary of State of the

State of New York, the publications so filed being the booklets entitled: Code
of Federal Regulations, title 49, parts 100 to 177, revised as of October 1, 1986; Code of Federal Regulations, title 49 parts 178 to 199, revised as of

October 1, 1986; Code of Federal Regulations, title 49, parts 200 to 399, revised as of October 1, 1986; and Code of Federal Regulations, title 10, parts
0 to 199, revised as of January 1, 1987; published in the Office of the Federal

Register, National Archives and Records Administration, as a special edition of
the Federal Register. The regulations incorporated by reference may be examined
at the Office of the Department of State, 162 Washington Avenue, Albany, NY
12231, at the Supreme Court Law Library, the Legislative Library, and the

Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority, Office of Counsel, Administrative

Building, Randall's Island, New York, NY 10035. They may also be purchased from
the Superintendent of Documents, Government Printing Office, Washington, DC
20402. Copies of the Code of Federal Regulations are also available at many
public libraries and bar association libraries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1024.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
